text: Bruno Brun (born ) was a Yugoslavian clarinet player and professor at the Music Academy in Belgrade. He graduated from the Belgrade Music Academy in and continued his education in Paris. He played as a soloist in Yugoslavia and other countries. He was one of the founders of the "Association of Musical Artists of Serbia". His most famous students are Milenko Stefanovic, Mihailo Zivanovic, Ernest Ackun, Ante Grgin and Nikola Srdic. ==References== * Blagojevic, Andrija."Bruno Brun () - Founder of the Yugoslav clarinet school." The Clarinet, Vol. 41/3 (), pp. 46-51. * Blagojević, Andrija. "The Performance Career of Bruno Brun." The Clarinet, Vol. 47/3 (), pp. 34–37. Category:1910 births Category:Clarinetists Category:Yugoslavian musicians
title: Bruno Brun
